QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, trim(trim(coalesce(stage_prefix, '')||' '|| coalesce(t_prefix, '')||'T'||t|| coalesce(t_suffix, ''))) as source_value_1, trim(trim(coalesce(stage_prefix, '')||' '|| coalesce(n_prefix, '')||'N'||n|| coalesce(n_suffix, ''))) as source_value_2, trim(trim(coalesce(stage_prefix, '')||' '|| coalesce(m_prefix, '')||'M'||m|| coalesce(m_suffix, ''))) as source_value_3, note_date, neoplasm_histology_key, 1147127 as meas_event_field_concept_id FROM {sc}.onc_tumor_node_metastasis l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where t is not null or n is not null or m is not null order by 1
